title: SpatialKey Announces Addition of Robust Data Analytics and Visualization to Hail Product
content:
]]> 

SAN FRANCISCO , Sept. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- SpatialKey has enhanced its hail impact analysis product with additional CoreLogic® data to provide insurers with a faster and more accurate way to coordinate aid to their clients. By incorporating Weather Verification Services from CoreLogic, SpatialKey Hail can now: 

Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150921/269075LOGO  

SpatialKey Hail unites trusted data and crisp visualizations, so clients can respond to events quickly and enhance customer satisfaction. Enhancing this app with Weather Verification Services from CoreLogic is another example of SpatialKey's commitment to giving clients the right information, right now.   

About SpatialKey 
SpatialKey is reinventing the way insurers transform data into actionable intelligence. SpatialKey solutions amplify the value of insured data and expert content through unmatched user experiences and breakthrough geospatial business intelligence. Through focused analytics and agile visualizations, SpatialKey helps more than 120 insurers understand global risk accumulations and composition, respond to live catastrophe events, and manage exposure proactively at the point of underwriting. For more information visit spatialkey.com.
